attributes.action: help with new rules on health insurance to gain resident permits turkey
attributes.additional_details: Expats of uk need help with new rules on health ınsurance to gain resident permit in turkey.We are finding this out of order and very confusing meaning people are returning home, stressed and confused, we all put money into the country have no rights and abide by the rules, this insurance is very expensive and we feel  why should we have to have this when other forigners in uk can claim everything free. We pay for medical care when its needed.
